FuncDef: The display service-instance-group command displays the configuration of a specific or all value-added service management (VSM) HA service instance groups.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the configuration of a service-instance-groupservice instance group with a specified name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo: To view the configuration of a specific or all service-instance-groupservice instance groups, run the display service-instance-group command. A service-instance-groupservice instance group name can be specified in this command to display the configuration of the specified service-instance-groupservice instance group.
